artist: Artist: After William Hogarth; Publisher: John Hinton
description: bust length portrait of man facilng left looking out at viewer; wearing fur cap. oval composition on a pedestal
inscription:
Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [ WILLIAM HOGARTH/ Eye natures walks, shoot folly as it flies/ And catch the Manners living as they rise./Pope/ Printed for J. Hinton at the King\'s Arma in Poternoster Row];  on sheet in pencil: [39/1-541]
title: Portrait of William Hogarth
